channel.title: User prune...please, srsly
channel.description:
Can a userprune please be conducted. You go to search a user/users and big lists of people with 0 posts come up.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=9016
Registered 1 year + ago and has 0 posts. So many like that, just on the first page!
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=mlist
What is the advantage of having so many unactive users kept in the database? Most of them have the 'Have to take the quiz' status.
It just clambers the forums and takes up uneeded space.

item.title: User prune...please, srsly
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It wouldn’t make a difference, same database and php files.

Read full topic

item.title: User prune...please, srsly
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I tried that first thing thuglife, it locks up at 60%

This might sound silly, but i don’t have a clue how you’re forums are set up but have you tried doing http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=maintain > Recount all forum totals and statistics.
On moparisthebest.com either?

Like i said i don’t know how you’re forums are set up so i wouldnt know if that would make any difference or not?

Read full topic

item.title: User prune...please, srsly

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

DELETE FROM `members` WHERE `lastLogin` = '0' AND `dateRegistered` < '1185613427' AND `posts` = '0' AND `instantMessages` = '0'

result:

Deleted rows: 44833 (Query took 13.7121 sec)

Happy?

Read full topic

item.title: User prune...please, srsly
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“nohope, post:130, topic:131551”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=182238.msg1678222#msg1678222 date=1187245625]

Why would you suspect 50k members making multiple accounts? Legit users should know thats against the rules.

Since when has that stopped anyone? If you count everyone who registered on moparscape (say, 30k) and each of them have five accounts, that is 150k for you. Some people over there even had eight+ accounts before they were banned.
[/quote]My question is why do they create more than 1 account?[/quote]
NO NO NO.

Say the register under:
HWEHEHSK727272
And want to be known as “Runescape power leveling”

Since name change’s aren’t available, they just make a new account.

Another example I’ve noticed:
Some need a account for mitb and mscp, so they don’t get made fun of for using both sites.

Another reason: rep

Once they get 15 rep on mscp(which can result in one post)
They will rep another account they make.

Or they just want a community with more members?
Lulz

Oh, and one more:
One account for every forum section.

Read full topic

Why would you suspect 50k members making multiple accounts? Legit users should know thats against the rules.

Since when has that stopped anyone? If you count everyone who registered on moparscape (say, 30k) and each of them have five accounts, that is 150k for you. Some people over there even had eight+ accounts before they were banned.
[/quote]My question is why do they create more than 1 account?[/quote]
That’s like asking why they don’t read stickies and constantly post in the wrong section.

Read full topic

item.title: User prune...please, srsly
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“nohope, post:123, topic:131551”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=182238.msg1676138#msg1676138 date=1187170446]

I think the leeches are just used to having to register to get the content so automatically do it, either that or a lot of the accounts are bot generated, which I don’t doubt after looks at a few pages of names.

Well, since a good 50k members were legit, think of each of them making three accounts. That puts us at about the amount we are at right now.
[/quote]Legit made like 50k members?[/quote]
Lol, no he means that they were created by individuals.
